Description:
Dive into the glamor, the frenzy and excitement of motor sport world's most exciting F1 2010 to be placed on the grid all drivers, teams and circuits of the long awaited official 2010 season F1 World Championship of the FIA.
Face F1 World Champion Fernando Alonso and the FIA, Michael Schumacher, Lewis Hamilton and Jenson Button in any of the circuits. F1 2010 is the return of the Canadian Grand Prix, the premiere high definition in the spectacular night race in Abu Dhabi and Singapore and the opportunity to tour the brand new circuit in South Korea even before the pilots.
Thanks to the technology platform for Codemasters' EGO games, the world of Formula 1 comes to life with sublime images, realistic control, the weather more varied and better market system damage in different modes of play with quick games, path training and online multiplayer games.
